Activity: Arrive at the office. Review yesterday's notes and emails, prioritize today's tasks.
Check project management system for any new updates or urgent notifications.

Facilitate a brainstorming session with @qres-1, @qres-2, @qres-3 to explore alternative model parameters or trading strategies to improve performance. Encourage open communication and idea sharing.

Address conflicts that occurred in the morning brainstorm between @qres-1 and @qres-2 by setting up a one-on-one meeting. Listen to each side of the argument and find a compromise.
